title: Russia pushes Ukrainian defenders to outskirts of key eastern city
content:
1. Russia pushes Ukrainian defenders to outskirts of key eastern city  Reuters
  2. As war in Ukraine drags on, fears of global food crisis grow  The Associated Press
  3. Ukraine may retreat from Sievierodonetsk. What does that mean for Russia's Donbas offensive?  NBC News
  4. Ukraine Regains Key Foothold on River Bank: British Intel  Newsweek
  5. Ukrainian forces could pull back from embattled eastern city  The Associated Press - en Español
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
